lead_paragraph: ESPN, which sued Verizon last year after being excluded from a new basic-cable package, voiced its pleasure over changes announced Friday to the channel lineup.

headline.main: ESPN Blesses New Lineup From Verizon
headline.print_headline: ESPN Blesses New Lineup From Verizon

snippet: ESPN, which sued Verizon last year after being excluded from a new basic-cable package, voiced its pleasure over changes announced Friday to the channel lineup.
